description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 20/5437/FUL dated 12/02/2021 for 'Demolition of the existing dwelling and erection of a new two storey dwelling with basement level and rooms in the roof space. Associated terrace areas and steps. Alterations to hard and soft landscaping. Retention and reduction of pond. Tree works.' Variation to include, Enlargement and alterations to basement footprint and lower ground floor terrace area including introduction of stairs from basement to garden terrace; Reduction in retained wall at basement level; Front lightwell; Relocation of staircase at basement level; Extension of ground floor terrace; Increase in depth and width of rear projections at ground, first and second floor level; Chimneys added to north and south flank elevations; Alterations to flat roof of dwelling including alterations to rooflights; Changes to detailing on building and alterations to fenestration; Marginal increase in height and width of garage and addition of two rooflights; Addition of solar panels to main body of roof; Change from flat roof to crown roof garage and marginal increase in height; Introduction of terrace and window to the rear elevation of the garage; Introduction of new windows and or doors on the south, north and east; Elevations across ground, first, second and roof level; Introduction of new dormer, roof lights and additional solar panels at roof level
